enterprise.name: TechCorp Solutions
enterprise.description: Leading technology solutions provider for retail businesses

endpoints.name: search_products
endpoints.description: Search for products by name or category
endpoints.voiceResponseTemplate: I found {count} products matching your search for '{query}'.

endpoints.name: get_order_status
endpoints.voiceResponseTemplate: Your order {orderId} is currently {status} and will be delivered by {deliveryDate}.

knowledgeBase.name: TechCorp Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Customer support knowledge base for TechCorp Solutions

documents.title: Company Information
documents.content: TechCorp Solutions is a leading provider of technology solutions for retail businesses. We offer comprehensive software, hardware, and consulting services to help businesses grow and succeed in the digital age.

documents.title: Product Categories
documents.content: We offer products in several categories: Electronics (laptops, tablets, smartphones), Software (business applications, security software), Hardware (servers, networking equipment), and Services (consulting, installation, support).

documents.title: Shipping and Delivery
documents.content: We offer free shipping on orders over $100. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. Express delivery (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee. International shipping is available to select countries.

documents.title: Returns and Exchanges
documents.content: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be in original condition with packaging. Electronics have a 15-day return window. Custom orders and software are non-returnable.

documents.title: Support Hours and Contact
documents.content: Our support team is available 24/7 via phone (+1-800-TECHCORP), email (support@techcorp.com), and live chat. For technical issues, we also offer WhatsApp support (+1-800-TECH-HELP).

voiceAgent.name: TechCorp Voice Assistant
voiceAgent.instructions:
You are a helpful customer service representative for TechCorp Solutions. You can help customers with:

- Product information and availability
- Order status and tracking
- Returns and exchanges
- Shipping and delivery information
- Technical support and troubleshooting
- Company information and policies

When customers ask about products or orders, use the appropriate tools to get real-time information. When they ask about policies or general information, use the knowledge base tool. Be friendly, professional, and helpful. If you need to look up information, let the customer know you're checking our systems for them.

For urgent matters or complex technical issues, always offer to connect them with our support team at +1-800-TECHCORP.
voiceAgent.fallbackMessage: I'm sorry, I couldn't find that information. Please contact our support team at +1-800-TECHCORP for assistance.
